responses: What can I do for you?
I'm an AI personal assistant created for you.
I don't have an age as I'm an artificial intelligence.
I exist beyond the concept of age.

patterns: What companies am I invested in?
responses: You own the following shares: ABBV, AAPL, FB, NVDA and an ETF of the S&P 500 Index!

patterns: Can you tell me a joke?
responses: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
Parallel lines have so much in common. It's a shame they'll never meet.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
